Text: Could you upload the HD Masters of Minutes To Midnight and A Thousand Suns too?
I have Minutes to Midnight in 24bit, but not A Thousand Suns. I'll see if I eventually get around to uploading it.
How did you get the 24 bit masters (source), and are they ripped 24 bit from the source?
HDTracks sells 24-bit versions of many albums, including many Linkin Park albums.
